Summary: Green light over Hughson moving North East to South West
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in Jr High school when I seen it. Me and a friend were going to his house I was on my bike he was on foot. I seen the Green light and told my friend about it. At witch point he ran to his house. While I got off my bike laid it down, then waved to the light. At that point it seemed to slow down or stop. It stayed there for a few more seconds then it took off faster than it had came. It was still traveling in the same direction. The street we were on was South 5th Street headed to 7th street.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hughson
There were no other sightings in Hughson on or around November 30th 1990
